overview: Halis is in his 40s, he is one of his own, who makes a living by his own katmer shop. He and his wife, Ayla, have had the coldness for years now. Probably the only common points of Halis and Ayla are their daughters.  Halis, who is also a municipal councilor, takes Meznun one day to run next to the katmer shop. Grateful to Halis for recruiting him in the beginning, Meznun crumbles the family's tense but obscure mundane lives after a while. The privacy is up and the family is faced with the realities that are known but are afraid to speak ...
title: River Inside Me
